title: Michael Sussmann Is Acquitted in Case Brought by Trump-Era Prosecutor
abstract: The Democratic-linked lawyer was accused of lying about his clients to the F.B.I. when he passed on a tip about possible connections between Donald J. Trump and Russia.
des_facet: Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates

multimedia.caption: The trial centers on a narrow charge against Michael Sussmann, a prominent cybersecurity lawyer with ties to Democrats.
multimedia.copyright: Samuel Corum for The New York Times
